events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Customer support agent Jane has been assigned to handle the refund request case.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item, and I am here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the attached photo clearly shows I got the wrong product.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund immediately and arrange for the wrong item to be returned at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and am happy with the refund offer. Thank you for your help.
The refund has been successfully issued to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days to see the amount reflected.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything else is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account yesterday. Thanks for the excellent service!
We are glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
